original_text: And the high priest stood up and said, “Have you no answer to make? What is it that these men testify against you?”
korean_text: 대제사장이 일어서서 예수께 묻되 아무 대답도 없느냐 이 사람들이 너를 치는 증거가 어떠하냐 하되

sentences.original_text: And the high priest stood up and said,
Have you no answer to make?
What is it that these men testify against you?”
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들이 너를 고발하는 것이 무엇이냐?”
